actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

official_title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that there should be established a Free Enterprise Education Week to encourage schools and businesses to educate students about the free enterprise system.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that a Free Enterprise Education Week should be established to encourage schools and businesses in the United States to educate students about the free enterprise system.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that there should be established a Free Enterprise Education Week to encourage schools and businesses to educate students about the free enterprise system.
